scripts.start: concurrently "yarn copy-resources" "cross-env BROWSER=none yarn react-start" "wait-on http://localhost:3000 && electron ."
scripts.rebuild-sqlite3-win32: cd node_modules/sqlite3 && npm run prepublish && node-gyp configure --module_name=node_sqlite3 --module_path=../lib/binding/node-v47-win32-x64 && node-gyp rebuild --target=9.0.5 --arch=x64 --target_platform=win32 --dist-url=https://atom.io/download/atom-shell --module_name=node_sqlite3 --module_path=../lib/binding/node-v47-win32-x64
scripts.rebuild-sqlite3-darwin: cd node_modules/sqlite3 && node-gyp configure --module_name=node_sqlite3 --module_path=./lib/binding/node-v83-darwin-x64 && node-gyp rebuild --target=9.0.5 --arch=x64 --target_platform=darwin --dist-url=https://atom.io/download/atom-shell --module_name=node_sqlite3 --module_path=./lib/binding/node-v83-darwin-x64
